reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong. Holds my knives perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2! Very stylish addition to the kitchen. Very easy to install less than 5 minutes. Holds my knives ready to slice and dice at any time. No more searching because right at hand. Magnet is very strong but not so strong you feel like you have to rip it off the wall. Very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about the Magnetic Knife Holder! It's truly a game-changer in my kitchen organization. This 10-inch magnetic strip is incredibly versatile, and I love the fact that I can use it both on my kitchen wall and on the refrigerator.The convenience it brings to my cooking routine is outstanding. I no longer have to rummage through drawers or fumble around in a clunky knife block. My knives are right at my fingertips, making meal preparation a breeze. The magnetic force of this holder is impressively strong, ensuring that my knives are securely held in place without any risk of falling.Not only does it keep my knives within easy reach, but it also doubles as an efficient tool holder for other kitchen utensils and metal tools. It's amazing how much more organized and efficient my kitchen has become since I added this magnetic strip.The sleek, modern design of the holder complements my kitchen decor perfectly, and it's super easy to install. The quality of the product is top-notch; it feels sturdy and well-made.In summary, the Magnetic Knife Holder is a fantastic addition to any kitchen. It's a space-saving, practical, and aesthetically pleasing solution to keep your knives and other metal tools neatly organized. If you want to streamline your kitchen and add a touch of elegance, this is the perfect accessory for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install, Works well
reviews.reviewText: This product was easy to install and would anywhere you'd want. I hung my on the wall with the included screws and it literally took just a couple of minutes. The magnet is super strong and in my case holds five large knives just fine. It could certainly hold more if needed. Great product, Great price and quick delivery. Over all an AWESOME product and price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong magnet, works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Took less than ten minutes to install and it looks so clean and professional. I ordered the longer size to hold all of my knives and so far it's been great. They stick well, don't slide, and the stainless steel goes with everything else in my kitchen. Wish I'd ordered one years ago instead of the knife block I was using. Really frees up a lot of space when there's not much to spare!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: Magnetic Knife Holder is the perfect size for my needs. I had looked at other holders, but they were all too wide for my space. This one fit perfectly on the side of my cupboard. It is strong enough to hold several knives and utensils. Looks nice. I used three 9 lb command picture frame holders to install it because I'm in a rental and screw holes are a no-no. As the holder itself weighs under 2 lbs, it is very secure installed this way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m surprised to say that the magnet isn’t as strong as I thought it would be. My knives are heavy, but I figured a magnet of that size would hold up, but I had to add another magnet underneath to keep in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very heavy duty! Exactly as described.
reviews.reviewText: This product was a snap to install and has a very strong magnet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for declutter
reviews.reviewText: I have limited counter space & so do not want a big knife block sitting out. Plus I always use the same 2 knives out of it so what’s the point of having that big thing in my way? This is a great item to keep your knives handy in close reach yet still be able to show off your nice knives & help declutter your countertops. I put out the 4 I’d probably use the most. I could probably add a fifth if I decide it’s necessary. The rest I’m getting rid of or putting in the drawer. It seems to hold them securely. No expected trips to the ER! The wall plate installed easily with 2 screws. I considered using some heavy duty double sided adhesive but the screws seemed a safer option. I like that the main magnet part can come off the wall plate for cleaning. Highly recommend.
